text.__SUMMARY__:
Millettia macrophylla is a species of legume in the family Fabaceae.
It is found in Cameroon, Equatorial Guinea, and Nigeria.
Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist lowland forests.
It is threatened by habitat loss.
text.References: World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998.  Millettia macrophylla.   2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species.   Downloaded on 19 July 2007.
